hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Epona's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Bunny Hood# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a grotto full of #spider webs#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Volvagia#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Zelda's Letter#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Deku Shield#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Song of Time#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Epona's Song#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #3# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Left Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Iron Boots# and #the Prelude of Light#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Haunted Wasteland torches# reveal #a Goron Tunic#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say all toasters toast toast.

SFM (Saria).text: Hey! Wait! Don't go out! It's unsafe!^Wild Pokmon live in tall grass!^You need your own Pokmon for your protection.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Huge Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #4# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Zelda's Letter#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #an Ocarina# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot
